amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Kimberly O'Connor, Executive Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 263 (Roll no. 459).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 263 (Roll no. 459).
